name: Sweet Georgia Peach and Pecan Dip
author: McCormick Spice
summary: Think outside the box this season with our Sweet Georgia Peach and Pecan Dip. It's the perfect blend of salty and sweet, with key ingredients including bacon, Georgia peaches, Vidalia onions and Grill Mates® Brown Sugar Bourbon Marinade. Add pecans for a nutty, crunchy finish.
ingredients: ½ cup thinly sliced Vidalia onion
1 (1.25 ounce) package McCormick® Grill Mates® Brown Sugar Bourbon Marinade
directions: Melt butter in large skillet on medium-high heat
Add onion and bacon; cook and stir 6 to 8 minutes or until bacon is crisp
Stir Marinade Mix, cola and brown sugar into skillet
Reduce heat to low; simmer 15 minutes or until mixture thickens slightly, stirring occasionally
Stir in peaches and pecans; simmer until heated through
Spread cream cheese evenly in bottom of 9-inch pie plate
Serve with assorted crackers or sliced French bread
